sections.content: I respect your right to privacy, so it's important (and legally required) for me to tell you about how my site deals with your data.

I do collect some personal data from you - nothing scary though; just the usual cookies and usage data. I just use these to remember who you are if you return to my site and keep track of when you visit.

I do everything in my power to make sure the data I collect from you is safe. If you need to know who can access the data I collect (it's just me), or anything else about your data, you're entitled to ask me at anytime, using the contact details found on this site.
I use Google Analytics to track users on my site, and their policy is to keep data for 24 months.
If you need to contact me with regards to this policy, please email me at sam@samhaakman.com
